name: administrator
description: Aplicacion para el control de trabajo de uniempresas (Medellín - Colombia)

scripts.dev: reset && sails run rebuild-cloud-sdk && NODE_ENV=development nodemon app.js --port=1337
scripts.dev2: reset && sails run rebuild-cloud-sdk && NODE_ENV=production nodemon app.js --port=1337
scripts.start: reset && sails run rebuild-cloud-sdk && NODE_ENV=production nodemon app.js --port=80
scripts.test: reset && sails run rebuild-cloud-sdk && npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: reset && eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo '✔  Your .js files look good.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo

author: Saúl Navarrov <sinavarrov@gmail.com> github.com/saulnavarrov
